display_long_description:
Your peaceful farm is under attack! Strange creatures crawl out at night and head straight for your fences. In Farm Defense VR, you are not just a farmer — you’re the last line of defense between your land and the invasion.

🌾 Features:
• Immersive VR shooting and aiming mechanics
• Defend your farm from waves of enemies that grow stronger every day
• Build barricades, turrets, traps, and upgrade your weapons
• Earn coins and gems to improve your gear and unlock new tools
• Victory screen and reward system after each day’s defense
• Colorful low-poly farm environment with lighthearted visuals

Grab your weapon, stand behind the fence, and protect your land at all costs.
Whether you fight alone or rely on your turrets, remember:
Every night they return. Every night you must defend.
